pre_flight_parked.pilot: {FACILITY} Clearance, {CALLSIGN}, at {LOCATION}, requesting IFR to {DESTINATION} with Information {ATIS_CODE}.
pre_flight_parked.atc: {CALLSIGN}, [{FACILITY} Clearance,] cleared [to] {DESTINATION} as filed, maintain initial altitude, squawk {SQUAWK}.

pre_flight_parked.pilot: {FACILITY} Delivery, {CALLSIGN}, IFR to {DESTINATION}, ready to copy.
pre_flight_parked.atc: {CALLSIGN}, [{FACILITY} Delivery,] cleared [to] {DESTINATION} as filed, fly runway heading, maintain assigned altitude, squawk {SQUAWK}.

pre_flight_parked.pilot: {FACILITY} Clearance, {CALLSIGN}, requesting IFR clearance to {DESTINATION} as filed.
pre_flight_parked.atc: {CALLSIGN}, [{FACILITY} Clearance,] standby [for IFR release to {DESTINATION}, I have a flow time of {TIME}].
{CALLSIGN}, cleared [to] {DESTINATION}, [contact] Ground [on] {FREQUENCY} [when ready for push or taxi].
{CALLSIGN}, IFR [clearance] to {DESTINATION} on [request, monitor this] frequency.

startup.atc: {CALLSIGN}, start approved, QNH {ALTIMETER}, report ready for taxi.
{CALLSIGN}, push and start approved, tail {TAXIWAY}, report ready for taxi.
{CALLSIGN}, engine start is at your discretion, altimeter {ALTIMETER}.

startup.pilot: {FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, requesting engine start, Information {ATIS_CODE} current.
startup.atc: {CALLSIGN}, start-up approved, expect Runway {RUNWAY} for departure.

taxi_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, at {LOCATION}, ready for taxi with {ATIS_CODE}.
taxi_out.atc: {CALLSIGN}, taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}, hold short of Runway {RUNWAY}.

taxi_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, requesting taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} for IFR to {DESTINATION}.
taxi_out.atc: {CALLSIGN}, taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}, hold short of {TAXIWAY}.

taxi_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, ready to taxi for departure to {DESTINATION}.
taxi_out.atc: {CALLSIGN}, follow traffic on {TAXIWAY}, taxi to Runway {RUNWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, taxi to the run-up area via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}, report when ready.

taxi_out.pilot: {FACILITY} Ground, {CALLSIGN}, requesting taxi to the run-up area.
taxi_out.atc: {CALLSIGN}, hold position [for arriving traffic], [then] taxi to Runway {RUNWAY} via {TAXIWAY_ROUTING}.

depart.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, holding short Runway {RUNWAY}, ready for departure.
depart.atc: {CALLSIGN}, Runway {RUNWAY}, cleared for takeoff, fly runway heading, wind {WIND}.

depart.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, number one, ready for departure.
depart.atc: {CALLSIGN}, behind departing traffic, line up and wait, Runway {RUNWAY}.
{CALLSIGN}, IFR release at {TIME}, hold short Runway {RUNWAY}.

depart.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, ready for departure from Runway {RUNWAY}.
depart.atc: {CALLSIGN}, fly the published departure, Runway {RUNWAY} cleared for takeoff.

cruise.pilot: {FACILITY} Center, {CALLSIGN}, requesting climb to avoid weather.
cruise.atc: {CALLSIGN}, descend and maintain altitude instructed, traffic at 12 o'clock.

final.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, established on the localizer Runway {RUNWAY}.

final.atc: {CALLSIGN}, continue approach Runway {RUNWAY}, traffic departing Runway {RUNWAY}.

final.pilot: Roger, looking for traffic on three mile final, {CALLSIGN}.
final.atc: {CALLSIGN}, number two for the runway, follow traffic on three mile final.
{CALLSIGN}, caution wake turbulence from preceding traffic, Runway {RUNWAY} cleared to land.

final.pilot: Gear down, Runway {RUNWAY} cleared to land, {CALLSIGN}.
final.atc: {CALLSIGN}, check gear down, Runway {RUNWAY} cleared to land, wind {WIND}.

go_around.pilot: Going around, {CALLSIGN}, executing published missed approach.
go_around.atc: {CALLSIGN}, execute missed approach, climb and maintain {MISS_ALT}, proceed to {MISS_FIX}.

go_around.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, on the go, missed approach Runway {RUNWAY}.
go_around.atc: {CALLSIGN}, Roger, fly runway heading, climb and maintain {MISS_ALT}.
{CALLSIGN}, climb and maintain {MISS_ALT}, follow published missed approach procedure.

go_around.pilot: {FACILITY} Tower, {CALLSIGN}, missed approach Runway {RUNWAY}, requesting vectors.
go_around.atc: {CALLSIGN}, contact Approach on {FREQUENCY} for further instructions.
{CALLSIGN}, Roger, fly heading {HEADING}, climb and maintain {MISS_ALT}.

holding.pilot: {FACILITY} Approach, {CALLSIGN}, entering the holding pattern at {HOLD_FIX}.
holding.atc: {CALLSIGN}, hold as published at {HOLD_FIX}, expect clearance at {TIME}.
{CALLSIGN}, enter the holding pattern, hold northwest of the station, altitude {ALTITUDE}.
{CALLSIGN}, cleared to hold at {HOLD_FIX}, fly standard turns, maintain {ALTITUDE}.
{CALLSIGN}, expect further clearance at {TIME}, continue holding.
{CALLSIGN}, resume approach, cleared to {HOLD_FIX}, descend and maintain {ALTITUDE}.
